import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import "./styling/RegistrationCSS.css" import Axios from "axios"; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const RegistrationPage = ({ times }) => { const [customerID, setCustomerID] = useState([]); let id = 0; for (let i = 0; i < customerID.length; i++) { let temp = customerID[i]; if (temp > id) { id = temp; } } id++; useEffect(() => { Axios.get('http://localhost:3001/getid').then((response) => { setCustomerID(response.data); console.log(response.data); }); }, []); return (

Registration

Personal Information

Email Address Full Name Date of Birth Username Password Address Phone Number

Emergency Contact Information

Full Name Phone Number Relationship

Hotel Information (Optional)

Hotel Name {/* Hotel Name Hotel Phone Number Hotel Address */}
) } export default RegistrationPage;
